#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;

typedef long long int ll;
typedef vector<int> vii;
typedef pair<int,int> pii;
typedef vector<pii> vpii;
typedef vector<int> vi;
typedef map<int,int> mii;
const int SIZE = 1e5+5;
const ll mod = 1e9+7;
const ll epf = -1e5+9;
const ll inf = 0x7fffffff;
int main()
{

int t;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
	int n,ans=0;
	cin>>n;
if((n/2)%2==0)
{
	n=n/4;
	cout<<n*n<<endl;
}
else 
{
	int k=n/2;
	k=k+1;
	int m=n-k;
	if(m%2!=0)
m=m-1;
cout<<(m/2)*(k/2)<<endl;	
	
	
}




	
	
}
	return 0;

	
}
